name: REGICIDE (F0xzilla)
description:
REGICIDE: The Pink Slayer is a fast paced beat 'em up bullet hell inspired primarily by Cabinet Man.

Explore ravage a world lost to save data corruption as SLAYER, slaughtering endless hordes of the undead, and using their SCORE to look STYLISH while doing so!

  • GROW MASSIVE FISTS!!!!
  • THROW THEM AT YOUR ENEMIES!!!
  • ENDLESS SWORDS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
  • PUNCH AND STAB DEMONS!!!!
  • Horses of the undead are sadly not a part of the game.
  • He awaits.
  • Made mostly by one person
  • Spanish version coming soon! (Yes, i am bilingual)

also you can get the OST here

rocky
